robot

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.Robot
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Calibration, Tests

    public class Robot
extends Object
    Implements simple API for cube manipulation on NXT2.0
    See Also:
    NxtOperation, NxtCommand
